H1.text: who sings ive loved you for a thousand years. Katy Perry

H2.text: who sings ive loved you for a thousand years. Ellie Goulding

H3.text: who sings ive loved you for a thousand years. Christina Perri

A4.text: Perri also gained recognition for writing and recording 'A Thousand Years', the love theme for the film The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 2 (2012), which appears on the accompanying soundtrack.

A5.text: Perri re-recorded 'A Thousand Years' for The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 2 soundtrack with guest vocals from Steve Kazee, titled 'A Thousand Years, Pt. 2'.
